message: I have a Rails 2.3 app that uses MySQL. When I try to load it with Pow, it fails trying to connect to the DB. The weird thing is that instead of using 127.0.0.1 or localhost, it is actually pulling my Comcast address. Anybody else run into this?
Does your database.yml specify 127.0.0.1 as the host?
Yeah. I have tried both 127.0.0.1 and localhost. I even tried mysql.dev since all the .dev addresses loopback to 127.0.0.1 anyway. Still not working.
